data.sentence: The word إِلَى comes from the root ا ل ي and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: Slit, cut, divide lengthwise, split, enlarge or make wideEmbarking upon the sea or a great river (vast expanse of water)Growing in anything (wealth, possessions, knowledge etc)A vast expanse of water (Ocean, sea, huge river)A fleet swift horse called because of its speed like the rolling of the waves in the seaA generous man who is ample in his generosityWide tract of land, land belonging to or inhabited by peopleAny town, village or city that has a running river or a body of waterLow or depressed landA large meadow or gardenA place where water stagnatesOf, relating to, or belonging to the ocean, sea or any vast body of waterSeaman, sailorVehemence of heat (corresponding to the month of July, Syrian)The moon"Bahira" (a camel dedicated to idols, 5:103)?

data.meanings: to strike with a stick. asiya/ya'sa - to take a stick, come together, collection, accumulation, amazing, gathering, assemblage, congregation. asa - staff, stick, rod, supports, nation, mastery, people, party, tongue, skin, bone. idrib bi asaka al hajer - strike with your staff on the rock, go forth with your people.
data.sentence: The word بِعَصَاكَ comes from the root ع ص و and is associated with the meanings: to strike with a stick. asiya/ya'sa - to take a stick, come together, collection, accumulation, amazing, gathering, assemblage, congregation. asa - staff, stick, rod, supports, nation, mastery, people, party, tongue, skin, bone. idrib bi asaka al hajer - strike with your staff on the rock, go forth with your people.

data.meanings: o separate/distinguish/divide/split/decide. farqun - the act of distinction or separating. fariq - who separates, discriminates. firqun - separate part, heap. firqatun - band of human beings. fariqun - part/portion, some party or band of human beings. furqan - criterion of right or wrong, draft, evidence or demonstration, a name of The Quran, aid, victory, argument, proof, dawn, distinction.. faraqa (vb. 2) to make a division or distinction, make a schism. tafriq - division, dissension.. faraqa (vb. 3) To quit, depart.. mutafarriqun - diverse, different. fariqa - to fear, be frightened, plunge in the wave, seek refuge in fear, succour. yafraqu - to be timid and afraid, appear in one's true colour, be cowardly, be ridden by fear.
data.sentence: The word فِرْقٍ comes from the root ف ر ق and is associated with the meanings: o separate/distinguish/divide/split/decide. farqun - the act of distinction or separating. fariq - who separates, discriminates. firqun - separate part, heap. firqatun - band of human beings. fariqun - part/portion, some party or band of human beings. furqan - criterion of right or wrong, draft, evidence or demonstration, a name of The Quran, aid, victory, argument, proof, dawn, distinction.. faraqa (vb. 2) to make a division or distinction, make a schism. tafriq - division, dissension.. faraqa (vb. 3) To quit, depart.. mutafarriqun - diverse, different. fariqa - to fear, be frightened, plunge in the wave, seek refuge in fear, succour. yafraqu - to be timid and afraid, appear in one's true colour, be cowardly, be ridden by fear.
